titleStmt.title: Description of Benjamin Zucker Family Ketubah Collection, KET Z24: Ketubah, 1895-1896.

notesStmt.note: Dimensions for the document currently unattainable.
Two parallel, gold contours divide the page vertically. The lower half of the document's wider, left side contains the text, inscribed in eleven narrow, horizontal panels.
Its upper half is divided into multiple sections, which display symmetrically-arranged foliate and geometric motifs in red, blue and gold, and Persian seals.
The narrow panel on the document's right side contains a blue pole medallion with red embellishments. A gold border frames the page.
